name: World bosses
description: A raid deep within Blackrock Mountain, home of Ragnaros the Firelord.

bosses.name: Azuregos
bosses.mainMechanic: Threat reset and teleport everyone to her

spells.name: Impending Doom
spells.desc: Inflicts 2000 shadow damage to nearby enemies after 10 sec

spells.name: Lucifron's Curse
spells.desc: Curses nearby enemies, increasing the costs of their spells and abilities by 100% for 5 min. This cost increase applies to all spells and abilities, whether they cost mana, rage, or energy.

spells.name: Dominate Mind
spells.desc: Controls a random player for 15 seconds.

spells.name: Cleave
spells.desc: 180° cleave up to 5 nearby targets.

roles.desc: be ready to start decursing once restorative potion is off.

bosses.strategy:
Kill adds first, melees be aware of your position to avoid cleave. NO AOE/CLEAVE to avoid kill your Mind control friend. 
Lucifron will cast on entire raid curses few seconds after the start of the fight : consume your restorative potion when you see the debuff.

bosses.name: Lord Kazzak
bosses.mainMechanic: Spit fire in the room, don't stand in the fire, fire hurt .

spells.name: Panic
spells.desc: Fears nearby enemies for 8 seconds.

spells.name: Lava Bomb
spells.desc: Target a random ennemy player, and spit a Lava bomb dealing 3200 fire damage over 8sec.

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.desc: Increase his attack dammage

spells.name: Lava Breath​​
spells.desc: Cast a breath in front of him, dealing around 1100 damage

spells.name: Magma Spit
spells.desc: deals 100 Fire damage and an additional 75 Fire damage every 3 seconds for 30 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times on nearby ennemies

roles.desc: Coordinate a rotation of Tranquilizing Shot to dispel Frenzy as soon as possible.
Keep Fear Ward on the main tank and reapply it when it fades. Try to apply as much fear ward you can before the fight(warrior don't need it, they have enough tools)

bosses.strategy: Prepot a GFPP, use a other one if it's consummed. Melees do not go in until he uses his first panic. Casters and healers be spread in the room. Don't stay in the fire.

bosses.name: Lethon
bosses.mainMechanic: Prepot GSPP, don't stay in rain of fire.

spells.name: Shadow Bolt​
spells.desc: 2000-2500 point shadow bolt on one random non-tank target.

spells.name: Rain of Fire
spells.desc: Deals fire damage in an area for 925 to 1075 Fire damage every 2 sec. for 6 sec.

spells.name: Fist of Ragnaros​
spells.desc: Stuns nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Sunder Armor​
spells.desc: reducing target armor by 1000 per Sunder Armor. Lasts 20 sec. Can stack up to 20 times.

spells.name: Strike
spells.desc: Strikes at an enemy, inflicting normal damage plus 35.

bosses.strategy: Prepot a GSPP and GFPP, kills adds first ( cleave and AOE allowed). Melee pop a FAP to counter Fist of Ragnaros effect
